statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_data_trends;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, block_number FROM healthcare_data_trends ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE block_number < 100;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis, treatment FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE gender='Male' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE block_number < 1000 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_number ASC
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM healthcare_data_trends WHERE treatment LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY diagnosis
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE admission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM healthcare_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Pneumonia' ORDER BY discharge_date DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, funding_source FROM research_studies WHERE researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data JOIN research_studies ON healthcare_data.patient_id = research_studies.study_id WHERE end_date > admission_date;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND discharge_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) as diagnosis_count FROM healthcare_data GROUP BY diagnosis
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT researcher_name, study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE funding_source = 'NIH'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_cost FROM healthcare_data WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT healthcare_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE topic = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT researcher_name, topic, timestamp FROM research_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE treatment_cost > 5000;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, topic, timestamp FROM research_data WHERE timestamp < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
SELECT decision_maker, decision_type, decision_date FROM decision_data WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data JOIN research_data ON healthcare_data.healthcare_id = research_data.research_id WHERE blockchain_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT clinic_id, clinic_name, location, total_doctors FROM clinics ORDER BY total_doctors DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, join_date FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT d.doctor_name, c.clinic_name, a.appointment_date FROM doctors d JOIN appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id JOIN clinics c ON c.clinic_id = a.clinic_id WHERE d.specialization = 'Cardiology';

SELECT p.patient_name, d.doctor_name, c.clinic_name, a.appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id JOIN clinics c ON c.clinic_id = a.clinic_id WHERE p.age < 40 ORDER BY a.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments, DATE_TRUNC('month', appointment_date) AS month FROM appointments GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', appointment_date) ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT hospital_name, location, rating FROM hospital_records ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT topic, description FROM research_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT hospital_name, location, rating FROM hospital_records ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT topic, description, start_date FROM research_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
